From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To test Flash memory on MCI and envm Flash EPROM interfaces, use the **test flash**command in EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: In the following example, the Flash memory is tested:

RelatedCmds.description: Tests the system interfaces on the modular router.
Performs a test of Multibus memory (including nonvolatile memory) on the modular router.
